channel.title: [DavidScape] Dying?
channel.description:
Does anyone have the conditional scripts to fix a character dying on DavidScape? Right now, when they die, the server crashes, and they have 0 hp, still alive in the wild. The errors that come up when someone dies, are below:
Server side error [URL=http://img62.imageshack.us/i/servererror.jpg/][IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7913/servererror.jpg[/img][/URL]
Client side error [URL=http://img683.imageshack.us/i/clienterror.jpg/][IMG]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/4199/clienterror.jpg[/img][/URL]
[b]Thanks in Advance[/b]
